define: Retrieve the seller's AMS validation bill
params:
{"request_params":[],"response_params":[{"name":"error","type":"string","sample":"error_auth","description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","key":"rkdSDnS"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"Invalid access_token","type":"string","required":null,"key":"DNcPxDS"},{"description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","name":"request_id","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","type":"string","required":null,"key":"ZGYrNje"},{"description":"","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"hMNXaf","children":[{"description":"","name":"validation_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"PbZhhsD","children":[{"description":"

Unique identifier of the billing entry.

","name":"validation_id","sample":"363636002508","type":"string","required":null,"key":"jmtPZXc"},{"description":"

Payment method. Applicable values:

1 = Online

2 = Offline

","name":"payment_method","sample":"1","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"JiDfQRS"},{"description":"

Billing month in the format YYYYMM (e.g., 202405).

","name":"validation_month","sample":"202508","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"jtifkde"},{"description":"

Source of campaign setup. Applicable values:

ShopeeManaged

Seller

","name":"campaign_source","sample":"ShopeeManaged","type":"string","required":null,"key":"wNkBjBF"},{"description":"

Billing details when payment method is Online.

","name":"online_bill","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"pSHTMJT","children":[{"description":"

Total commission amount for the billing month.

","name":"total_amount","sample":"300.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"dKFcfw"},{"description":"

Billing Status. Applicable values:

1 = Pending
2 = Completed

3 = In process

4 = To pay via payment link

5 = Manual completed

6 = To Be Settled Offline

","name":"bill_status","sample":"2","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"rAYztbx"},{"description":"

Commission amount already deducted.

","name":"deducted_amount","sample":"300.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"CHxGbKy"},{"description":"

Commission amount paid using AMS Credits

","name":"ams_credit_deducted_amount","sample":"200.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"DtndaYZ"},{"description":"

Commission amount pending deduction.

","name":"pending_amount","sample":"0","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"STHfHEG"}]},{"description":"

List of billing details when payment method is Offline, grouped by order placement month.

","name":"offline_bills","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"MytXxFN","children":[{"description":"

Order placement month in the format YYYYMM.

","name":"order_place_month","sample":"202507","type":"int32","required":null,"key":"BYzHfre"},{"description":"

Total commission amount = commission_amount_after_tax + ams_credit_deducted_amount.

","name":"total_amount","sample":"420.5","type":"float","required":null,"key":"zAYwzfc"},{"description":"

Offline commission amount before tax.

","name":"commission_amount","sample":"200.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"xtYEQws"},{"description":"

Offline commission amount including tax.

","name":"commission_amount_after_tax","sample":"220.0","type":"float","required":null,"key":"YwxmKj"},{"description":"

Commission amount already paid using AMS Credits.

","name":"ams_credit_deducted_amount","sample":"200.5","type":"float","required":null,"key":"RDrBHyZ"}]}]}]}]}
